law.catch_line: Publication Of Facts Relating To Condemnation Of Animal Or Property
law.text: The board of health of the town where any animal or property has been condemned under section one hundred and forty-six may cause a description of the place in which such condemned property was found, the name of each person in whose possession it was found and the name of each person convicted of an offence under the three preceding sections to be published in two newspapers published in the county where such property was found.
